price: da žurimo da im neko dobro učinimo? Nikako, ali oni ne opažaju.
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
